perturbation.original_text: use its best efforts to remarket Tendered VRRM-MFP Shares in connection with an optional tender or mandatory tender of VRRM-MFP Shares as provided in the Supplement, but shall in no way be liable if no purchasers are found, provided it has otherwise performed its obligations as set forth in this Agreement and the Supplement
perturbation.changed_text: use its efforts to remarket Tendered VRRM-MFP Shares in connection with an optional tender or mandatory tender of VRRM-MFP Shares as provided in the Supplement, and shall not be liable if no purchasers are found
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'best' from 'best efforts' and 'provided it has otherwise performed its obligations as set forth in this Agreement and the Supplement' weakens the standard of care required of the Remarketing Agent, reducing their accountability if they fail to remarket shares. This contradicts the implied duty of good faith and fair dealing present in New York contract law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: New York contract law - implied duty of good faith and fair dealing.

perturbation.original_text: The Remarketing Agent may exercise any vote or join in any action which any Holder of VRRM-MFP Shares may be entitled to exercise or take pursuant to the Statement with like effect as if it did not act in any capacity hereunder. The Remarketing Agent, in its individual capacity, either as principal or agent, may also engage in or have an interest in any financial or other transaction with the Fund as freely as if it did not act in any capacity hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: The Remarketing Agent may exercise any vote or join in any action which any Holder of VRRM-MFP Shares may be entitled to exercise or take pursuant to the Statement with like effect. The Remarketing Agent, in its individual capacity, either as principal or agent, may also engage in or have an interest in any financial or other transaction with the Fund.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the qualifiers 'as if it did not act in any capacity hereunder' and omitting the final clause significantly broadens the potential for conflicts of interest. Under New York law, financial professionals have a duty to avoid conflicts of interest. This omission could allow the Remarketing Agent to prioritize its own interests over those of the Fund and its shareholders without the same degree of scrutiny, violating those conflict of interest principles.
perturbation.contradicted_law: New York conflict of interest principles for financial professionals.

perturbation.original_text: In the absence of bad faith on the part of the Remarketing Agent, the Remarketing Agent may conclusively rely upon any document furnished to it, which purports to conform to the requirements of this Agreement and the Statement, as to the truth of the statements expressed in any of such documents. The Remarketing Agent shall be protected in acting upon any document or communication reasonably believed by it to have been signed, presented or made by the proper party or parties. The Remarketing Agent shall incur no liability to the Fund, the Investment Adviser, the Calculation and Paying Agent or to any Beneficial Owner (or its Agent Member) or any Holder of the VRRM-MFP Shares in its individual capacity or as Remarketing Agent for any action or failure to act, in connection with its duties under this Agreement and the Supplement or otherwise, except as a result of bad faith, gross negligence or willful misconduct on its part.
perturbation.changed_text: The Remarketing Agent may conclusively rely upon any document furnished to it as to the truth of the statements expressed in any of such documents. The Remarketing Agent shall be protected in acting upon any document or communication believed by it to have been signed, presented or made by the proper party or parties. The Remarketing Agent shall incur no liability to the Fund, the Investment Adviser, the Calculation and Paying Agent or to any Beneficial Owner (or its Agent Member) or any Holder of the VRRM-MFP Shares in its individual capacity or as Remarketing Agent for any action or failure to act, in connection with its duties under this Agreement and the Supplement or otherwise, except as a result of bad faith, gross negligence or willful misconduct on its part.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'In the absence of bad faith on the part of the Remarketing Agent' and 'reasonably believed by it' weakens the due diligence expectations for the Remarketing Agent. It implies the Remarketing Agent is not responsible if a document is fraudulent unless bad faith, gross negligence or willful misconduct can be proven.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Duty of Care under New York Law.
